widgets.title: Transactions And Error Codes
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*),count(errorCode) from Transaction since 1 day ago FACET appName

widgets.title: Revenue Day Over Day
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal)/365 As 'Revenue' FROM Transaction WHERE name = 'WebTransaction/JSP/purchase/confirmation.jsp' since 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Live Users
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(session)*151 AS 'Site Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 2 minutes ago

widgets.title: Users Day Over Day
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(session)/9 AS 'Site Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago

widgets.title: Total Revenue At Risk in Dollars
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(PurchasedCartGrandTotal)/450 AS 'Average Price' from Transaction where error  IS NOT NULL since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Purchase Confirmation Page Duration
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) AS 'Duration' FROM PageView facet buckets(duration,10,10) SINCE 5 hours ago WHERE pageUrl like '%shoppingcart'

widgets.title: Home Duration > 4s
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*)*2 as 'Page Views' FROM PageView where pageUrl LIKE '%webportal%.amazonaws.com/' and duration >= 4 since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Purchase Conversion
widgets.nrql: SELECT funnel(session, WHERE pageUrl like '%webportal%.amazonaws.com/' AS 'Home', where pageUrl like '%.amazonaws.com/login' AS 'Login', WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%webportal%.amazonaws.com/browse/%' AS 'Browse Items',  WHERE pageUrl LIKE '%webportal%.amazonaws.com/shoppingcart' AS 'Purchased') FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago

widgets.title: Average Cart Value, Number of Errors
widgets.nrql: SELECT 53.2 AS 'Avg Margin', count(*) AS 'Purchase Errors' from Transaction where name = 'WebTransaction/JSP/purchase/confirmation.jsp' AND  error  IS NOT NULL since 1 day ago

widgets.title: Logins by Region
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM PageView facet regionCode SINCE 1 HOUR AGO limit 10

widgets.title: Error Responses
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(httpResponseCode) FROM Transaction  WHERE  httpResponseCode != '200' facet httpResponseCode

widgets.title: Users past day vs the day before
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(session) AS 'Site Visitors' FROM PageView SINCE 1 day ago COMPARE WITH 1 day ago TIMESERIES
